name: Oboro
aura: Increases Ally ATK in Dungeons by 33%.

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. 
Will attack all enemies instead if the target is under 4 or more debuffs.
skills.name: Spreading Chaos
skills.books:
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. The second hit has a 75% chance of transferring all debuffs from this Champion to the target.

The first hit has a 75% chance of stealing all buffs from the target when attacking under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.

skills.desc: Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if this attack is critical.

skills.desc: Places a [Revive on Death] buff on this Champion for 3 turns whenever they receive a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff.
